it.polimi.automata.io.ba.transformers

Class BATransitionToStringTransformer<LABEL extends Label,TRANSITION extends Transition<LABEL>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.automata.io.ba.transformers.BATransitionToStringTransformer<LABEL,TRANSITION>
  • Type Parameters:
    LABEL - is the type of the Label which is applied to the transitions of the Buchi Automaton which must implement the interface Label
    TRANSITION - is the type of the transitions of the automaton. It must implement the interface Transition
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.collections15.Transformer<TRANSITION,java.lang.String>

    public class BATransitionToStringTransformer<LABEL extends Label,TRANSITION extends Transition<LABEL>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.collections15.Transformer<TRANSITION,java.lang.String>
    contains the Transformer that given a transition return its string representation

    claudiomenghi
